definition: Chengde prefecture-level city in Hebei/also Chengde county
surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
virtue/goodness/morality/ethics/kindness/favor/character/kind
Chengde prefecture-level city in Hebei
Chengde county in Chengde 承德[Cheng2 de2], Hebei
Chengde prefecture (old name)/now Chengde prefecture-level city

sentences.english: Plan a trip to Chengde, China, for your next vacation!
sentences.chinese: 爲你的下個假期計劃去中國承德旅行吧。

sentences.english: Homestays are arranged in Chengde with Chinese families.
sentences.chinese: 可安排在承德的中國人家庭住宿。

sentences.english: On summer's warm days, the coolness of Chengde gives the same pleasure to the visitors.
sentences.chinese: 在麗日和風的暖夏，承德的清涼依然。

sentences.english: I hope I’ve convinced you to make your next vacation Chengde, China.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我已經說服你們下次假期到中國的承德來。

sentences.english: So, see your travel agent and make plans to visit Chengde, China, soon!
sentences.chinese: 所以，趕快到旅行社去計劃你的承德之行吧。

sentences.english: Chengde is famous for its beautiful scenery.
sentences.chinese: 承德以它的美麗風景而著稱。

sentences.english: Chengde mobile companies so that the overall level of construction has increased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 使承德移動公司的整體工程建設水平有了明顯提高。

sentences.english: Chengde area residents have been eating grass jelly, more than 300 years of history.
sentences.chinese: 承德一帶居民食用涼粉已有300多年的歷史。

sentences.english: Rattus confucianus and Apodemus peninsulae were captured only in the mountain area of Chengde located in the north of Hebei province.
sentences.chinese: 社鼠和大林姬鼠僅分佈在河北省北部承德山區。

sentences.english: The college is located in Chengde City, which is famous for its scenic beauty and historical background.
sentences.chinese: 學校座落在我國著名的歷史文化名城河北省承德市。

sentences.english: b. Chengde is famous for several products. Silk
sentences.chinese: 承德的幾種物產很有名。

sentences.english: Material Filiale of Chengde Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 是承德鋼鐵公司下屬吧？

sentences.english: The ancient time bronze mirrors in the Chengde County museum collection are described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹承德縣博物館館藏的古代銅鏡。

sentences.english: In the time of Qianlong, the vegetation in Chengde was extremely good, and pines reached high up to the sky, blotting out the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 乾隆時期承德植被極好，參天蔽日的樹環繞避暑山莊。

sentences.english: Tan Ping was born in Chengde in 1960.
sentences.chinese: 譚平1960年出生於中國承德。

sentences.english: Blue Island Tower is located in Chengde City, Shuangqiao District.
sentences.chinese: 藍島大廈位於承德市雙橋區。
